list_definition.mean_english: học gạo, đọc sách miệt mài
list_definition.definition: to study hard, especially by memorizing eg for an examination

list_ex_of_definition.ex_of_definition: She’s swotting for her history test.

list_definition.definition: an unkind word for a person who studies hard.

list_ex_of_english: It is regarded rather like "swotting" at school; but nevertheless it is absolutely fundamental to our full recovery.
It is very well done, and one did a lot of swotting at home and got it clear.
Secondary school teachers fight an unending struggle against classroom cultures in which anyone who works hard is stigmatised as a swot.
In some places it is used splendidly, but in others it is used merely for swotting for examinations.
Swot as a verb suggests acting like a swot, studying for one's exams.
I have tried to make a kind of swot report to look at strengths and weaknesses and to see where we have got to.
I enjoy what was called swotting in my day.
